thread.title: Working Mother and small business owner
thread.title_full: R&G Brenner Income Tax reviewed by Working Mother and small business owner

author: Working Mother and small business owner
title: Working Mother and small business owner
text: R & G Brenner professionals are the best! My tax professional, Rene Gracia of the Midtown Office is amazing. I have been using him to prepare my personal and business taxes for years. He is very knowledgeable and I can tell he takes the time to learn any updates in policy from year to year. I've never been confused by the process and always felt I can trust my taxes were prepared at the highest level.
